data.content:
noun
plural ~ cards
[count] US
a plastic card that allows a person to charge telephone calls to an account - called also phone card
old-fashioned :a small card presented when making a formal visit to someone that has the name and sometimes the address of the visitor - often used figuratively to describe something that identifies a particular person or group
The young actor's bright smile is his calling card. - called also (Brit) visiting card

(từ Mỹ) như visiting card
xem visiting card
